title: Home
description: We are an E&P company. But we're not your usual E&P company. We're pushing what's possible, embracing collaboration as the new normal, and thinking differently. We are Spirit Energy.
cleaned_text: THE POWER TO BE DIFFERENT We are a truly pioneering energy company with a portfolio and ambitions that span the breadth of the energy transition. We're continuing to break new ground, collaborating and thinking differently SERIOUSLY CHALLENGING Safely delivering production from our existing assets [OUR OPERATIONS](/our-operations/) NOT WHAT YOU EXPECT Proudly building a culture that's all ours. We are not what you know and not what you might expect.
